events.title: Arbitrum DAO Proposal AIP-7 Passed
events.description: Major governance proposal to increase sequencer fee revenue distribution approved with 89% support. Expected to boost ARB token utility.

events.title: Optimism Bedrock Upgrade Complete
events.description: Successful deployment of Bedrock upgrade, reducing transaction fees by 40% and improving confirmation times.

events.title: USDC Depegging Event Detected
events.description: USDC trading at $0.95 on several exchanges following Circle banking concerns. Flight to safety expected.
